ygData.subject: Re: The latest patch
ygData.msgSnippet: One major thing that affects us that the box of abu kar is no longer weightless - only 10% weight reduction! Damn it! ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
ygData.messageBody:
One major thing that affects us that the box of abu kar is no longer
weightless - only 10% weight reduction! Damn it!

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
I.J.A. Dellimore Degrees: EE & PHYSICS
Email:ijad@... Duke '98.

On Tue, 14 Sep 1999, Scott Hueseman wrote:

> From: "Scott Hueseman" <shueseman@...>
>
> Kinda quiet today, so I thought I'd stir some it up:
>
> Are there any new things in the patch that help/hurt monks? Lot's of spell
> changes went in, warriors got a new set of weapons, and there are some new
> undiscovered quests out there.
>
> What affects us? I haven't been able to play yet, so I don't know.
>
> Dornn
